changes.description: Add support for Spotify's [Client Credentials Flow](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api/tutorials/client-credentials-flow) with public auth helpers, token caching, and env var support. ([#36](https://github.com/jonathan343/spotify-sdk/pull/36))

Document client credentials usage, auth helpers, env vars, and limitations across quickstart, client reference, and a new auth reference page. ([#36](https://github.com/jonathan343/spotify-sdk/pull/36))
